column1: ['Assistant: hello, I am here to help you find a movie trailer recommendation', 'User: Hello, I am looking for an action movie', 'Assistant: okay.', 'Assistant: before I recommend you some movies, I would like to know what the last action movie you just watched', 'User: The last movie I saw was XMen - Dark Phoenix', 'Assistant: cool.', 'Assistant: so I assume you are a fan of superhero movies?', 'User: Yes, I am a big fan of superhero movies.', 'User: I loved the last Avengers movie', "Assistant: that's nice!", 'Assistant: what do you like best from superhero movies?', 'User: I like when the main character has some sort of special abilties, or powers', 'Assistant: ah I see... have you watched all Marvel movies?', 'User: I have watched most of the Marvel movies.', 'Assistant: then have you watched DC movies?', 'Assistant: like superman or batman?', 'User: I have watched most of the DC movies too, all of the superman and batman movies.', "User: I haven't seen all of the SpiderMan movies though", 'Assistant: okay... there is a Spider-Man animated version.', "User: I don't think I've seen that one.", 'User: I saw some of the one about entering the spider universe or something like that', 'Assistant: this animated version is titled: QUOTATION_MARKSpider-Man: Into the Spider-VerseQUOTATION_MARK and the plot is QUOTATION_MARKTeen Miles Morales becomes Spider-Man of his reality, crossing his path with five counterparts from other dimensions to stop a threat for all realities.QUOTATION_MARK', 'User: Oh ok, I see.', 'User: I have not seen that one.', 'User: The last SpiderMan movie I saw was SpiderMan: Far from home', 'Assistant: Nice.', 'Assistant: Do you want to check it out?', 'User: Yes, I accept and would like to check it out.', 'User: Have you seen it?', 'Assistant: yes I watched it with my friends and we really enjoyed it!', 'User: Ok great, thanks so much for the recommendation :)']

['Assistant: Good morning, how are you doing?', 'User: im good, how are you?', 'Assistant: I am doing well.', 'Assistant: Have you been to the movies lately?', 'User: I have!', 'User: I just went over the weekend, but we love going to the movies and are always looking for recommendations of what looks good?', 'Assistant: Me too, love the movies.', 'Assistant: Have you seen Queen and Slim?', 'Assistant: It is amazing and gritty.', 'Assistant: I highly recommend it.', 'User: No, ive actually never even heard of it.', 'User: What genre is it?', 'Assistant: It is a drama.', 'Assistant: What was the movie you saw over the weekend?', 'User: I took my daughter to see Frozen 2 with my husband.', 'Assistant: Cool, I was thinking of seeing that myself.', 'Assistant: How was it?', 'User: It was better than we could have expected, I think i even like it more than the first.', 'User: Definitely cant wait until we can buy it.', 'Assistant: That;s good.', 'Assistant: Was there anything that you did not like?', 'Assistant: What types of movies do you typically like?', 'User: I cant really think of anything that didnt exceed my expectations honestly.', 'User: I normally like romance of comedy movies though.', 'Assistant: Cool, that is great about frozen.', 'Assistant: If you like romance have you seen Last Christmas?', 'User: No, but i love Christmas movies!', "Assistant: It's a romance/comedy movie I've hear its quite good.", 'Assistant: It stars Emilia Clarke from Game of Thrones', 'User: We watched the game of thrones series religiously so i love her!', 'User: Id love to watch that for sure.', 'Assistant: Yes I loved that show too.', 'Assistant: I think she was also in a Star Wars movie.', 'Assistant: Are you excited for the newest Star Wars to come out at Christmas?', 'User: not really my husband is, hes planning on seeing it the day it comes out.', 'User: Is last christmas out already?', 'Assistant: Yes, it came out recently, November 8', 'User: Perfect, thats the movie ill be watching later today!']

['Assistant: Hi there!', 'Assistant: Interested in seeing a movie??', 'User: That I am!', 'Assistant: Great!', 'Assistant: What kind of movies do you like?', 'User: I like action, comedies, and animated movies.', 'Assistant: Have you seen the trailers for Frozen 2??', "User: I have not, but I don't like Frozen.", 'Assistant: Oh!', 'Assistant: No problem at all.', 'Assistant: How about The Avengers Endgame?', 'Assistant: Are you a superhero kind of person?', "User: Absolutely, I've seen them all!", 'Assistant: I heard Marvel Studios is coming out with a new one called QUOTATION_MARKBlack WidowQUOTATION_MARK in 2020...', 'User: I would LOVE to see that', 'Assistant: Scarlett Johannsen will be in it I think.', 'Assistant: Looks pretty cool.', "User: It does, it's right up my alley.", 'User: She was great in all the other movies.', 'Assistant: Sweet, So would you like to watch the trailer?', 'User: Sure!', "Assistant: hmm, not sure what I'm supposed to do now with this hit...", 'User: I think we just have to hit the 10 conversations haha', 'Assistant: Oh, ok.  Well I have selected the Avengers: Endgame as a recommendation to view the trailer...', 'Assistant: I really would be interested in that one that comes out in may for sure tho!', 'User: I accept the Avengers: Endgame as the recommendation', 'Assistant: Great!', 'Assistant: Thanks.', 'User: Thank you for your help!']

['Assistant: hi', "User: hey, what's up?", 'Assistant: what types of movies do you like?', 'User: i like psychological thrillers the most', 'Assistant: what movie did you see last?', 'User: The Silence of the Lambs', 'Assistant: Since you say you like thriller movies, what about a trailer for the Joker?', "User: sure, i've been interested in that movie anyway.", "User: i don't think i've seen the trailer.", 'Assistant: okay, got it', 'User: should i watch the trailer?', 'Assistant: yes', 'User: looks good so far', 'Assistant: okay great', "User: i think i'll go see this movie.", "User: i wonder how long it'll still be in theaters for", 'Assistant: probably at least another month', 'User: have you seen it?', 'Assistant: not yet', "User: i heard it's a lot like Taxi Driver, which i love", 'Assistant: I have not heard of that', "User: it's pretty old.", "User: De Niro's in it.", 'User: anyway, i accept the reccomendation of Joker.', 'User: thanks!']

['Assistant: Hi', 'User: Hello!', 'Assistant: What type of movies do you like?', 'User: I do enjoy all type of movies.', 'Assistant: See any good ones lately?', 'User: I have and it is a horror movie.', 'Assistant: which one?', 'User: I do recommend a movie called ,QUOTATION_MARKFright NightQUOTATION_MARK.', 'Assistant: How about Ford V Ferrari?', 'User: I just saw the trailer about this movie that just came out!', 'Assistant: Got It', 'User: Would you recommend this movie?', 'Assistant: Yes!', 'User: I will keep that in mind to go see, how about QUOTATION_MARKThe RingQUOTATION_MARK, that is coming out soon?', 'Assistant: To scary for me, but sounds like you like horror', 'User: I sure do and will recommend this movie to anyone who loves horror movies.', 'Assistant: Awesome, I think you should see it', 'User: I think I will!', 'Assistant: you should watch the trailer', 'User: I will watch the trailer and I do QUOTATION_MARKAcceptQUOTATION_MARK your recommendation for the movie QUOTATION_MARKFord v Ferrari!']

['Assistant: Hi!', 'Assistant: I am here to recommend a movie to you!', 'User: Hi I am looking for a good action comedy I am getting sick of the holiday movies already!', "Assistant: I don't blame you!", 'Assistant: Do you like satirical super-heros?', 'Assistant: Deadpool might be just the thing for you.', 'User: I am not into the super heros movies- my husband is.', 'User: Got any other recommendations?', 'Assistant: If you enjoy British comedy, Hot Fuzz is hilarious.', 'User: British comedies I love like Red Dwarf!', 'User: I have not heard of Hot Fuzz before- when was it released?', 'Assistant: 2007', 'Assistant: It has Simon Pegg in it and he is absolutely great.', 'User: Is that Simon PEgg of Shaun of the dead?', 'Assistant: Yes!', 'User: Oh my gosh I am totally putting Hot Fuzz on my list to watch- I will have to check if it is on Netflix or Hulu if not I think it will be worth renting from Amazon!', "Assistant: Apparently M Turk doesn't have Hot Fuzz when I search, lol, but at least you can look for it on your own.", 'Assistant: Have you seen Zombieland?', 'User: Yes we just went to Zombieland 2 in the theater over the weekend.', 'User: Another favorite of mine!', 'User: Woody Harrelson is great', "Assistant: Dang, can't pick one you already saw.", "Assistant: I just need to find one that M Turk has in their search bar, lol, sucks they don't have Hot Fuzz, I have no idea why.", 'User: I will find that one.', 'User: But I accept the recommendation for Hot Fuzz', "Assistant: I don't think I can do a recommendation since it's not listed in their search bar.", 'Assistant: I have to do a search and then pick from their listed movies.:(', 'User: ahhh got it- Then I can accept Zombieland', 'Assistant: Got it!', "Assistant: Thanks, lol, I hope you enjoy Hot Fuzz though, it's really great!", 'User: I definately will!', 'User: OK now where do we end this it says  4.', "User: If you accept your partner's recommendation, let your partner know through the chat.", 'User: Then, click QUOTATION_MARKAcceptQUOTATION_MARK after both of you are DONE with the chat.', 'Assistant: I selected Zombieland so hopefully you see that?', 'User: nope', "Assistant: I don't have any other buttons... hmmm, it says it's selected.", 'User: Done appeared now for me!', 'User: We had to finish our 10 chats I think first.', 'User: have a great Thanksgiving', 'Assistant: You too!']

['Assistant: hi', 'User: Hello I was wondering if you had a good recommendation for a sci-fi or action movie?', 'Assistant: I am not really into sci-fi movies but do you like superhero movies?', 'Assistant: If you do the avengers is a great movie', 'User: Yes Iike superhero movies!', 'User: However, I have seen the Avengers.', 'User: Do you know of any others?', 'Assistant: Thor, Ant Man, Spider man, Black Panther, Hulk, Batman those are all great movies', 'User: Neat!', 'User: I would love to learn more about the Black Panther.', "User: I have heard of it, but I haven't seen it yet!", 'Assistant: The black panther is a great movie about African tribes fighting over meterorite I think you will really enjoy it if you like action and super her movies', 'User: Fascinating!', 'User: I bet that has some great suspense for a superhero movie as well.', 'User: I am going to plan on seeing that movie in the future!', 'User: Thanks for the recommendation.', 'Assistant: you are very welcome I hope that you enjoy it as much as I did', 'User: Thanks!', 'User: Is it one of your top 5 favorite super-hero movies?', 'Assistant: yes it is!', 'User: Great!', "User: I'll also have to see Hulk, which was on your list as well.", 'Assistant: That is another great movie', 'User: Awesome!', 'User: What do you plan on seeing next?', 'Assistant: well I am taking my niece to see the new frozen movie tomorrow', 'User: Neat!', 'User: Do you like cartoons as much as superhero movies?', 'Assistant: yes I enjoy a good cartoon movie every now and then', 'User: Awesome.', 'User: Have you seen Toy Story 4?', 'User: I love the character Forky.', 'Assistant: no I have not seen that movie yet.', 'Assistant: I have heard good things about it.', 'Assistant: Is it worth seeing?', 'User: Yes!', 'User: It is really good, but not as good as the first two Toy Story movies.', 'Assistant: I will have to check that out.', 'Assistant: Maybe I will watch it with my niece this week']

['Assistant: Hello!', 'Assistant: How are you?', 'Assistant: Are you enjoy watching movies?', 'User: Hello.', "User: I'm well.", 'User: How are you.', 'User: Yes, I enjoy watching movies.', 'User: You?', 'Assistant: Me too.', 'Assistant: What kind of movies do you like?', 'User: I like all kinds.', 'User: Fantasy, action/adventure, scary and murder/mystery.', 'Assistant: Sounds good.', 'Assistant: What you typically looking in movies?', 'Assistant: What makes you watch it?', 'User: Something that will hold my interest.', 'Assistant: Any movies you watched recently and liked it so much?', "User: I've seen Charlie's Angels and The Exorcist.", 'Assistant: The Exorcist is really great thriller/mystery.', 'Assistant: I also liked it.', "Assistant: Charlie's Angels is recent movie if I remember correctly.", "User: No, I haven't seen the recent one.", "Assistant: So did you watch Charlie's Angels?", "Assistant: It's this year movie.", 'User: No.', "User: I have not watched the new Charlie's", 'Assistant: Ok.', 'Assistant: But do you want to watch it?', "Assistant: It's cool action movie.", 'User: No.', 'User: I would rather a thriller/mystery.', 'Assistant: Do you use Netflix?', 'User: Yes.', 'Assistant: Have you ever about the movie called QUOTATION_MARK1922QUOTATION_MARK?', 'User: No.', "Assistant: It's about a farmer to Nebraska, where he sets on the path to write a confession for a murder from his past.", 'Assistant: The Netflix is adapted from a Stephen King novella.', 'User: I reject 1922.', 'User: Any other?', 'Assistant: Black Hawk Down.', "Assistant: It's about US invasion to Somalia.", "Assistant: It's so cool movie.", 'User: I accept.']

['Assistant: How is it going?', 'User: good .', 'User: hows it for you', 'Assistant: Great!', 'Assistant: I just saw a great film.', 'Assistant: What movies do you like?', 'User: I like thrillers and fiction movies', 'Assistant: What is the best thriller you have seen lately.', 'Assistant: I want to go see one this weekend.', 'User: a movie called Get Out', 'Assistant: I think Ive heard of that one.', 'Assistant: Was there anything that made it stand out?', 'User: Get Out is a 2017 American horror film written and directed by Jordan Peele in his directorial debut.', 'User: It stars Daniel Kaluuya, Allison Williams, Lil Rel Howery', 'Assistant: Nice!', "Assistant: I think I have seen some of Jordan Peele's other flicks.", 'Assistant: Do like them?', 'User: yes i also do.', "User: Chris, an African-American man, decides to visit his Caucasian girlfriend's parents during a weekend getaway.", 'User: Although they seem normal at first, he is not prepared to experience the horrors ahead.', 'Assistant: That is a good one.', 'Assistant: You should also check Big Mouth.', 'Assistant: It is fairly new, like 2017.', 'User: Oh okay.', 'User: Whats the story about?', 'Assistant: It kind of weird.', 'Assistant: You might like Us though.', 'Assistant: It is kind of creepy.', 'User: okay fine', 'User: oh okay i will go through that', 'Assistant: It seems like a pretty terrible vacaction to me.', 'User: oh okay.', 'User: it was good having conversation with you.', 'User: can we end the chat', 'Assistant: Yes I think this is the last round', 'User: ok then we will do that']

['Assistant: Hello', 'User: Hi!', 'User: I am really bored right now so can you recommend me a movie to watch?', 'Assistant: Are you a Disney or Super hero movie fan?', 'User: I am a Disney movie fan', 'Assistant: The live action Lion King movie is better than what people gave it credit for', 'User: I am not really a fan of the live action Disney remake movies', "Assistant: Oh that's understandable.", "Assistant: Maybe you're a fan of pixar then?", "User: I do like Pixar but I've seen all their movies, I would like something a bit different", 'Assistant: Hmm any genre in particular?', 'User: I am looking for something that has romance', 'Assistant: Romance huh?', 'Assistant: Have you ever watched QUOTATION_MARKThe Silver liningQUOTATION_MARK?', 'User: I have never heard of that.', 'User: Is it a Disney movie?', 'Assistant: No.', "Assistant: It's a romance movie.", 'User: Oh, I was hoping for an animated Disney movie with romance in it', "Assistant: Oh I don't mind providing suggestions about that.", "Assistant: I don't know which ones you already seen though.", 'User: I have seen all Disney movies from 2010 and onward, so any before that with romance would be great', 'Assistant: Hmm in that case, I feel like the Lady and the Tramp has a lot of romance.', "User: I've heard of that but I think that has romance between dogs.", 'User: I was looking for something with romance between humans', 'Assistant: What about someone that was human?', 'User: That sounds interesting!', 'User: Please let me know what movie it is', 'Assistant: Beauty and the Beast', 'User: Sounds fun!', 'User: Thanks for the recommendation, I accept it and I will watch it right now!', 'Assistant: Thank you.', 'Assistant: I hope you enjoy it!']

['Assistant: Hello there, how are you doing?', 'User: Good I am looking for a trailer', 'Assistant: What type of movies do you like best?', 'User: I love anything pre 2001, especially horror.', 'User: I mean classic horror', 'Assistant: Same here, I really like classic horror films.', 'Assistant: How about actors, any favorites?', 'User: I like a lot.', 'User: In particular, I like John Cazale and Laurence Olivier, but they are not from any good horror movies', 'Assistant: How about directors, any preferences?', 'User: Stanley Kubrick, John Landis', 'Assistant: Good call, two of my favorites as well.', 'User: I like slashers, monster movies, ghost movies, all of the above really.', 'User: Brian de Palma is great as well.', 'Assistant: So would you like to watch this movie trailer?', 'User: I think so.', 'User: But, what movie?', 'User: You did not offer any', 'Assistant: I am sorry, I am trying to figure this thing out.', "Assistant: I selected 'Rosemary's BabyQUOTATION_MARK from 1968.", 'User: Oh, great movie.', "User: I'd love to see that one.", 'Assistant: Nice!', 'Assistant: I think you would really like it based on your preferences/', 'User: I will check that one out.', 'User: I think I just need one', 'Assistant: I think the director is really good too, strange person, but good director', 'User: Yes, Roman Polanski is a great director.', 'Assistant: I think Mia Farrow is excellent in it as well.', 'User: I love her as an actress.', 'User: I appreciate that.']

['Assistant: DO you like drama?', 'User: I do enjoy a good drama, actually.', 'Assistant: Have you seen The Joker?', "User: I've been under a rock, so I have not seen The Joker yet.", 'User: Do you think it would be of interest to me?', 'Assistant: What types of movies do you normally watch?', "User: I often opt for movies that are realistic and grounded in their premises, and feature characters that don't cleanly fit into any stereotype", 'Assistant: Then I do think you would enjoy Joker', 'User: Does The Joker have a good deal of action in it?', 'Assistant: Yes it does, It has drama action suspense', 'User: You mentioned suspense, does it deliver the suspense well?', 'Assistant: Yes it is very intense', 'User: Then I absolutely want to watch The Joker.', 'User: Thank you for the recommendation.', "Assistant: You're welcome.", 'Assistant: Tells a side of the Joker no one has known', 'User: That sounds wonderful.', 'User: I accept that recommendation.', 'Assistant: Great.', 'Assistant: I hope you enjoy.', "User: ...The 'Accept' button seems to be absent.", 'Assistant: I think there needs to be 10 turn total', 'User: I see, I thought we had met that minimum.', 'User: Would you say that The Joker requires a lot of knowledge about the existing DC Comics universe to understand it?', 'Assistant: No it does not.', 'Assistant: This is a whole new storline', "User: Wonderful, I haven't been keeping up with it so that would've been a little concerning."]

['Assistant: Hello, how are you?', "User: I'm doing good, how about you?", "Assistant: I'm doing really good.", 'Assistant: Ready for this Thanksgiving weekend!', "Assistant: I hear you're looking for movies to watch?", 'User: Yes, I actually am.', 'User: I am looking for a good action movie for Thanksgiving.', 'Assistant: Action, huh?', 'Assistant: Funny action or just straight-up action?', "User: Just like any action movie, but I'd like one with more action kind of like Fast and Furious", 'Assistant: Ok, I got you now.', "Assistant: I'm guessing you're looking for more modern, and not old 80's movies like Rambo, lol", 'User: Yeah, not Rambo right now.', 'User: Have some kids I need to entertain', 'Assistant: Ok, I got it.', "Assistant: So you can't have a lot of profanity either, right?", 'Assistant: Or is that not an issue?', 'User: Just not an R rated movie.', 'User: A couple swears here and there is fine.', 'Assistant: How do you feel about the Expendables?', "User: Oh, I definitely wouldn't be opposed to that.", "User: What's the plot like?", "Assistant: You're got oldies but goodies like Stallone, Schwarzenegger, and Harrison Ford added to a huge team to take down a rival co-founder.", 'User: That seems like a great movie to watch with the kids.', 'User: Have you ever watched the movie?', "Assistant: I've seen it and thought it was great fun.", 'Assistant: Let the kids see even old people can be cool, lol', 'User: Yeah, I definitely agree.', 'User: Do you know the length of the movie?', 'Assistant: 2 hours and 11 minutes', "User: Ok, that's short enough to keep the kids occupied for the whole movie.", 'User: Is it on any streaming services such as Netflix?', "Assistant: It's on Amazon Prime, YouTube (with fee), or even iTunes if you don't have Prime.", "User: Ok, that's perfect.", "User: I think we'll be watching the Expendables this weekend.", 'User: Thanks for the recommendation!', 'Assistant: No problem.', 'Assistant: Have a good Thanksgiving!']

['Assistant: Hello!', 'Assistant: I am here to help you find a movie to watch!', 'User: Great, I love movies.', 'User: Anything you can recommend?', "User: I've been watching a lot of science fiction movies recently.", "Assistant: Well, my absolute favorite movie of all time is Interstellar, and it's pretty science fiction(y)-- have you ever seen it?", 'User: Yes, I have seen it.', 'User: Great movie, Matthew McConaughey is a good actor.', 'User: So was Anne Hathaway.', "Assistant: I completely agree-- the entire movie just blew my mind because it's science fiction but it's honestly something that actually could happen one day.", "Assistant: But if you've already seen that, then let's focus on finding you something new!", "Assistant: What's the last movie you watched and what did you like or not like about it?", 'User: I recently watched the 1st avengers movie, I especially liked the Incredible Hulk.', 'User: Reminds me of my childhood.', 'Assistant: Ah, the Avengers movies are so good!', 'Assistant: I personally adore the Avengers Universe and I think my favorite movie so far has been Spiderman Homecoming with Tom Holland as Spiderman.', 'Assistant: Have you seen that movie?', "User: No I haven't, the last Spiderman I watched were the ones with Toby McGuire.", 'Assistant: I watched the ones with Toby McGuire when I was younger, and those are amazing too.', 'Assistant: But I actually really love what they have done with the new version of Spiderman.', "Assistant: In Spiderman Homecoming, Peter Parker is kind of like a geeky, weak high-school student who doesn't have a lot going for him until he becomes Spiderman!", "Assistant: It's a refreshing twist on Spiderman in my opinion; it's a retelling, not a replacement for Toby McGuire's famous Spiderman!", 'User: Perhaps I should watch the newer ones.', "User: Right now I'm wondering why Spiderman wasn't included in the avengers, wasn't he also a Stan Lee creation?", 'Assistant: He was-- Spiderman actually shows up in the third Avenger Movie, Avengers: Infinity War.', "Assistant: I think he was an addition that they hadn't thought of before, so they introduced him first in Captain America: Civil War before he was actually in Spiderman: Homecoming.", "Assistant: But yes, he is introduced in the third Avengers movie and then he is in all of the subsequent Avenger's movies!", "User: I plan to watch the rest of the avengers movies, it'll be interesting to see how Spiderman affects the movie.", 'User: I also watched Captain Marvel the other day, I enjoyed the performance by Brie Larson, and Samuel Jackson is always good.', 'Assistant: Then I think my final recomendation will actually be Avengers: Age of Ultron.', 'Assistant: I know you like science fiction and the Avengers, so I feel like this is logically the next best movie for you to watch!', "Assistant: Spiderman isn't in this movie, but he appears in the next one; however, you have to watch the Avengers movies in order to understand what's going on in them.", 'Assistant: So what do you think?', "User: Yeah, I'll take you up on the recommendation to watch Age of Ultron.", 'User: Did you notice they are also making a movie about Black Widow?', 'User: I enjoyed that character from The Avengers', 'Assistant: I did!', "Assistant: Doesn't Scarlette Johanson star as Black Widow?", "Assistant: I don't know a lot about her storyline, but she is definitely amazing in her role as Black Widow!", "Assistant: She appears in the subsequent Avenger's movies as well, so you should enjoy her in those.", 'User: Yes, Scarlett Johansson.', 'User: I remember seeing her in a movie called The Horse Whisperer, it was a sad movie.', 'User: But Scarlett Johansson gave a nice performance.', 'User: It may have been one of her 1st movies.', 'Assistant: I actually just', "User: I'm trying to think of what else she has appeared in, all I can think of is The Island", 'Assistant: I just saw Jojo Rabbit in theaters and she stars as the mother of Jojo.', 'Assistant: The story takes place in Nazi Germany during World War II and she is great in her role as the mother of the boy.', "Assistant: If you ever have time, Jojo Rabbit is still in theaters and it's a must see!", "User: I haven't heard of Jojo Rabbit, is a drama?", 'User: War movie?', "Assistant: Yeah, it's a comedy movie about a little boy in Nazi Germany who has Hitler as an imaginary friend.", "Assistant: After he finds out that his mom is hiding a Jewish girl in their house, he slowly changes his ideologies to fit less with Hitler's.", "Assistant: It's a great movie and I'd highly recommend.", 'Assistant: But yes, it was great talking with you!', "Assistant: I hope that you have a great time watching the next Avenger's movies, but firstly, Avengers: Age of Ultron!", 'User: Okay, thank you for the recommendation.', 'User: Looking forward to seeing the trailer']
